name: Eco Bamboo Tunic in Black
description:
Eco Bamboo and modern prints come together in this beautiful little tunic. Perfect as a summer dress, and transitions easily to chilly weather with leggings and a cardigan. 

A versatile peice that will grow with your little girl and fit later on as a top. {Dress hits above the knee, see sizing chart for more details} Cute button detail. Modern vintage inspired accent fabric. A very special little dress.

Bamboo is an eco friendly, sustainable fabric that is rich in softness and feels super comfy on.

Sizes available 2, 4, 6, 8

Made in BC Canada

~designs copyright Katie Tabor 2007-2010~

name: Eco Bamboo Tunic in Navy
description:
Eco Bamboo and silkscreened accents come together in this beautiful little tunic. 

Perfect as a summer dress, and transitions easily to chilly weather with leggings and a cardigan. 

A versatile peice that will grow with your little girl and fit later on as a top. {Dress hits above the knee, see sizing chart for more details}. Violet tie at waist, Silk screened old fashioned blossoms. A very special little dress.

Bamboo is an eco friendly, sustainable fabric that is rich in softness and feels super comfy on.

Sizes available 2, 4, 6, 8

Handmade & silk screened in BC Canada

~designs copyright Katie Tabor 2007-2010~

name: LOVE Organic Baby Tee
description:
LOVE Organic Baby Tee in Pomegranate. Oh so precious! Print in black, artwork by Dan Gauthier. Tee by American apparel. Silk screened in studio. 

Sizes, 3-6m, 3-12m, 12-18m. American Apparel sizing runs small, ordering a size up is recommended and will allow for shrinkage.


Tee made in LA
Silkscreened in Studio in BC Canada

name: Pirate Raglan
description:
Pirate Raglan printed in studio with xo. Tee by American Apparel. Graphic by Dan Gauthier. Edgy style for that awesome little person in your life!

Sizes 2, 4, 6, 8. American Apparel runs small, ordering a size up is recommended for best fit and to allow for shrinkage.

Tee made in LA
Printed in studio in BC Canada
